text: Khalil Rahman Haqqani (1966 â€“ 11 December 2024) was an Afghan Pashtun warlord, Mujahideen leader and politician. He was the acting Minister of Refugee and Repatriation from 7 September 2021 until his death. He was a well known member of the Haqqani network. On December 11, 2024, a suicide bomber killed Haqqani and four others at his Ministry of Refugee and Repatriation office in Kabul. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Afghan politicians Category:Assassinated people Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Khalil Haqqani
